name: Nykrig
description:
Nykrig is a claustrophobic twin stick shooter.

It doesn't want you to feel good, but it wants you to succeed.

Mouse+Keyboard and Xbox controller supported.

If the web version is not smooth for you, grab the Windows and Mac downloadables below.

Developer's note:

I made this as a prototype that could become bigger in the future. I'm pretty happy with the visual style. I didn't have too much time to polish the gameplay, but I hope it already shows potential. Thanks for playing.
